# Bitfinex API Documentation

> 87 documentation files | ~78k tokens

## General Documentation

- [Authentication](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/authentication.md): Authentication
- [Change Log](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/change_log.md): v2024-10-16
- [Error Codes](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/error_codes.md): Error/Info Codes
- [Network Connectivity](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/network_connectivity.md): What is an API?
- [Rate Limits](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/rate_limits.md): Rate Limits
- [Response Formats](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/response_formats.md): Abbreviation Glossary

- [GET Get Leaderboards](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/endpoints/public/get_leaderboards.md)
- [GET Get Liquidations](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/endpoints/public/get_liquidations.md)
- [GET Get Platform Status](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/endpoints/public/get_platform_status.md)
- [GET Get Stats](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/endpoints/public/get_stats.md)
- [GET Get Ticker](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/endpoints/public/get_ticker.md)

- [GET Get Tickers History](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/endpoints/public/get_tickers_history.md)
- [GET Get Trades](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/endpoints/public/get_trades.md)
- [GET Get Virtual Asset Service Providers](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/endpoints/public/get_virtual_asset_service_providers.md)
- [POST Post Foreign Exchange Rate](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/endpoints/public/post_foreign_exchange_rate.md)
- [POST Post Market Average Price](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/bitfinex/endpoints/public/post_market_average_price.md)
